# CESIONBNK Design System - AI Instructions
# @biomahd-creator/financio-design-system v0.2.3
#
# This file helps AI/LLM tools (Claude, ChatGPT, Copilot, Figma Make, etc.)
# correctly use this design system when generating code.
# It ships with the npm package and should be read before generating any UI.

---

## 1. CRITICAL SETUP (MUST DO FIRST)

Before using ANY component, the consumer project MUST import the theme CSS.
Without this, components render without colors, fonts, spacing, or dark mode.

```css
/* In your main CSS file (e.g., src/styles.css or src/index.css) */
@import "tailwindcss";
@import "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/theme.css";
```

This single import provides:
- All CSS custom properties (colors, shadows, radius)
- Satoshi font family (loaded via CDN)
- Light/Dark mode variables
- Tailwind v4 @theme bindings
- KPI color variants
- Elevation shadow scale

If styles are not appearing, the theme.css import is missing. This is the #1 issue.

---

## 2. COMPONENT CATALOG

### 2.1 Import Syntax

```tsx
// Option A: Full import (convenient)
import { Button, Card, Badge } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system";

// Option B: Layer import (better tree-shaking)
import { Button } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";

// Option C: Direct import (best tree-shaking)
import { Button } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui/button";
```

### 2.2 UI Primitives (`/ui`) - Atoms & Molecules

Core building blocks. Built on Radix UI + Tailwind CSS.

| Component | Import from | Key Props | Notes |
|---|---|---|---|
| `Accordion` | `/ui/accordion` | `type`, `collapsible` | AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger, AccordionContent |
| `Alert` | `/ui/alert` | `variant`: default, destructive, success, warning, info | AlertTitle, AlertDescription |
| `AlertDialog` | `/ui/alert-dialog` | — | AlertDialogTrigger, AlertDialogContent, AlertDialogAction, AlertDialogCancel |
| `AspectRatio` | `/ui/aspect-ratio` | `ratio` | Wraps content in aspect ratio container |
| `Avatar` | `/ui/avatar` | — | AvatarImage, AvatarFallback |
| `Badge` | `/ui/badge` | `variant`: default, secondary, destructive, outline, success, warning, info | Inline status label |
| `BottomSheet` | `/ui/bottom-sheet` | — | Mobile-first sliding panel |
| `Breadcrumb` | `/ui/breadcrumb` | — | BreadcrumbList, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink, BreadcrumbSeparator |
| `Button` | `/ui/button` | `variant`: default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link; `size`: default, sm, lg, icon | Main interactive element |
| `Calendar` | `/ui/calendar` | `selected`, `onSelect`, `mode` | Based on react-day-picker |
| `Card` | `/ui/card` | — | Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter, CardAction |
| `Carousel` | `/ui/carousel` | — | CarouselContent, CarouselItem, CarouselPrevious, CarouselNext |
| `Checkbox` | `/ui/checkbox` | `checked`, `onCheckedChange` | Binary selection |
| `CodeBlock` | `/ui/code-block` | `code`, `language` | Syntax-highlighted code display |
| `Collapsible` | `/ui/collapsible` | `open`, `onOpenChange` | CollapsibleTrigger, CollapsibleContent |
| `Command` | `/ui/command` | — | CommandInput, CommandList, CommandGroup, CommandItem |
| `ContextMenu` | `/ui/context-menu` | — | ContextMenuTrigger, ContextMenuContent, ContextMenuItem |
| `DateRangePicker` | `/ui/date-range-picker` | `value`, `onChange` | Date range selector |
| `Dialog` | `/ui/dialog` | — | DialogTrigger, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogDescription, DialogFooter |
| `Drawer` | `/ui/drawer` | — | DrawerTrigger, DrawerContent, DrawerHeader, DrawerFooter |
| `DropdownMenu` | `/ui/dropdown-menu` | — | DropdownMenuTrigger, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem |
| `EmptyState` | `/ui/empty-state` | `icon`, `title`, `description`, `action` | Placeholder for empty content |
| `FloatingActionButton` | `/ui/floating-action-button` | `icon`, `onClick` | Fixed-position action button |
| `Form` | `/ui/form` | — | FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormControl, FormMessage (react-hook-form wrappers) |
| `HoverCard` | `/ui/hover-card` | — | HoverCardTrigger, HoverCardContent |
| `Input` | `/ui/input` | `type`, `placeholder`, `disabled` | Standard text input |
| `InputFile` | `/ui/input-file` | `accept`, `multiple` | File selector |
| `InputOTP` | `/ui/input-otp` | `maxLength` | One-time password input |
| `Label` | `/ui/label` | `htmlFor` | Accessible form label |
| `LoadingOverlay` | `/ui/loading-overlay` | `isLoading`, `text` | Full-screen loading state |
| `LoadingStates` | `/ui/loading-states` | `variant` | Spinner, skeleton, pulse variants |
| `Menubar` | `/ui/menubar` | — | MenubarMenu, MenubarTrigger, MenubarContent, MenubarItem |
| `MultiSelect` | `/ui/multi-select` | `options`, `value`, `onChange` | Multi-select with tags |
| `NavigationMenu` | `/ui/navigation-menu` | — | NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuLink |
| `Pagination` | `/ui/pagination` | — | PaginationContent, PaginationItem, PaginationLink, PaginationPrevious, PaginationNext |
| `Popover` | `/ui/popover` | — | PopoverTrigger, PopoverContent |
| `Progress` | `/ui/progress` | `value` (0-100) | Linear progress bar |
| `ProgressWithRange` | `/ui/progress-with-range` | `value`, `startLabel`, `endLabel` | Progress bar with range labels |
| `RadioGroup` | `/ui/radio-group` | `value`, `onValueChange` | RadioGroupItem |
| `ResizablePanelGroup` | `/ui/resizable` | `direction` | ResizablePanel, ResizableHandle |
| `ScrollArea` | `/ui/scroll-area` | — | Custom scrollbar container |
| `Select` | `/ui/select` | — | SelectTrigger, SelectValue, SelectContent, SelectItem |
| `Separator` | `/ui/separator` | `orientation`: horizontal, vertical | Visual divider |
| `Sheet` | `/ui/sheet` | `side`: top, right, bottom, left | SheetTrigger, SheetContent, SheetHeader, SheetTitle |
| `Skeleton` | `/ui/skeleton` | `className` (set width/height) | Loading placeholder |
| `Slider` | `/ui/slider` | `value`, `onValueChange`, `min`, `max`, `step` | Range selector |
| `SplitButton` | `/ui/split-button` | `label`, `onClick`, `menuItems` | Button with dropdown |
| `Switch` | `/ui/switch` | `checked`, `onCheckedChange` | Toggle on/off |
| `Table` | `/ui/table` | — | TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell |
| `Tabs` | `/ui/tabs` | `defaultValue` | TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent |
| `Textarea` | `/ui/textarea` | `placeholder`, `rows` | Multiline text input |
| `TextareaAutoresize` | `/ui/textarea-autoresize` | `placeholder` | Auto-growing textarea |
| `Toggle` | `/ui/toggle` | `pressed`, `onPressedChange`, `variant` | Binary state button |
| `ToggleGroup` | `/ui/toggle-group` | `type`: single, multiple; `value` | Group of toggles |
| `Tooltip` | `/ui/tooltip` | — | TooltipTrigger, TooltipContent (wrap in TooltipProvider) |

### 2.3 Advanced Components (`/advanced`) - Complex Visualizations

| Component | Import from | Key Props | Notes |
|---|---|---|---|
| `ChartShowcase` | `/advanced/ChartShowcase` | — | Gallery of chart examples |
| `Combobox` | `/advanced/Combobox` | `options`, `value`, `onChange`, `placeholder` | Autocomplete select |
| `ConditionalForm` | `/advanced/ConditionalForm` | `schema` | Dynamic form with conditional fields |
| `DataTable` | `/advanced/DataTable` | `columns`, `data` | TanStack Table with filters, sort, pagination |
| `DatePickerWithPresets` | `/advanced/DatePickerWithPresets` | `value`, `onChange`, `presets` | Date picker with quick presets |
| `ExportData` | `/advanced/ExportData` | `data`, `columns`, `filename` | CSV/Excel export utility |
| `FileUploader` | `/advanced/FileUploader` | `accept`, `maxSize`, `onUpload` | Drag & drop file upload |
| `FormBuilder` | `/advanced/FormBuilder` | `fields`, `onSubmit` | Visual form constructor |
| `FunnelChart` | `/advanced/FunnelChart` | `data` | Funnel visualization |
| `GaugeChart` | `/advanced/GaugeChart` | `value`, `min`, `max` | Gauge/speedometer |
| `Heatmap` | `/advanced/Heatmap` | `data`, `xLabels`, `yLabels` | Heatmap visualization |
| `InfiniteScroll` | `/advanced/InfiniteScroll` | `loadMore`, `hasMore` | Infinite scrolling list |
| `InvoiceGenerator` | `/advanced/InvoiceGenerator` | — | Invoice PDF/preview generator |
| `MasonryGrid` | `/advanced/MasonryGrid` | `columns` | Pinterest-style grid |
| `MasterDataGrid` | `/advanced/MasterDataGrid` | `data`, `columns` | Master data with bulk editing |
| `RatingComponent` | `/advanced/RatingComponent` | `value`, `onChange`, `max` | Star rating input |
| `RichTextEditor` | `/advanced/RichTextEditor` | `value`, `onChange` | WYSIWYG editor |
| `Sparkline` | `/advanced/Sparkline` | `data`, `color` | Mini inline chart |
| `StepIndicator` | `/advanced/StepIndicator` | `steps`, `currentStep` | Wizard step progress |
| `Timeline` | `/advanced/Timeline` | `items` | Vertical timeline |
| `TransferList` | `/advanced/TransferList` | `leftItems`, `rightItems` | Dual-list transfer |
| `TreeTable` | `/advanced/TreeTable` | `data` | Hierarchical table |
| `TreemapChart` | `/advanced/TreemapChart` | `data` | Treemap visualization |
| `VirtualizedList` | `/advanced/VirtualizedList` | `items`, `rowHeight` | High-performance list |

### 2.4 Business Patterns (`/patterns`) - Ready-to-Use Organisms

| Component | Import from | Key Props | Notes |
|---|---|---|---|
| `ActivityFeed` | `/patterns/ActivityFeed` | `items` | Recent activity feed |
| `AdminPortal` | `/patterns/AdminPortal` | — | Admin panel layout |
| `AdvancedFilterPanel` | `/patterns/AdvancedFilterPanel` | `filters`, `onApply` | Complex filter sidebar |
| `AppLayout` | `/patterns/AppLayout` | `sidebar`, `children` | Full layout with collapsible sidebar |
| `ApprovalFlowWizard` | `/patterns/ApprovalFlowWizard` | `steps` | Approval process wizard |
| `ApprovalTimeline` | `/patterns/ApprovalTimeline` | `steps` | Approval status timeline |
| `AuditLogViewer` | `/patterns/AuditLogViewer` | `logs` | Audit log viewer |
| `CommentThread` | `/patterns/CommentThread` | `comments` | Nested comment system |
| `CupoValidator` | `/patterns/CupoValidator` | — | Credit limit validator |
| `DataTableAdvanced` | `/patterns/DataTableAdvanced` | `data`, `columns` | Advanced DataTable implementation |
| `EditableTable` | `/patterns/EditableTable` | `data`, `columns` | Excel-like inline editing |
| `FactoringCalculator` | `/patterns/FactoringCalculator` | — | Factoring cost calculator |
| `FactoringKpiCard` | `/patterns/FactoringKpiCard` | `title`, `value`, `icon`, `variant`: green, blue, yellow, orange, lime, purple | KPI card for factoring |
| `FactoringKpiCardGroup` | `/patterns/FactoringKpiCardGroup` | `cards`, `activeIndex`, `onSelect` | Clickable KPI card group |
| `KPIShowcase` | `/patterns/KPIShowcase` | — | KPI cards grid |
| `MultiStepWizard` | `/patterns/MultiStepWizard` | `steps` | Generic step wizard |
| `NotificationCenter` | `/patterns/NotificationCenter` | `notifications` | Notification dropdown |
| `OnboardingWizard` | `/patterns/OnboardingWizard` | `steps` | User onboarding flow |
| `QuickActionToolbar` | `/patterns/QuickActionToolbar` | `actions` | Contextual action bar |
| `ReportsConsultation` | `/patterns/ReportsConsultation` | — | Report filtering & pagination |
| `SearchResults` | `/patterns/SearchResults` | `results`, `query` | Search results page |
| `StatsDashboard` | `/patterns/StatsDashboard` | — | Statistics dashboard |
| `UploadZone` | `/patterns/UploadZone` | `onUpload`, `accept` | Specialized upload area |
| `UserProfileCard` | `/patterns/UserProfileCard` | `user` | Detailed profile card |

### 2.5 Widgets (`/widgets`) - Composed Blocks

| Component | Import from | Key Props | Notes |
|---|---|---|---|
| `ActionButton` | `/widgets/ActionButton` | `onClick`, `loading`, `success` | Button with loading/success states |
| `BookingCalendar` | `/widgets/BookingCalendar` | `onBook` | Calendar booking widget |
| `ColorBox` | `/widgets/ColorBox` | `color`, `label` | Color display box |
| `ColorSwatch` | `/widgets/ColorSwatch` | `color` | Static color sample |
| `ContactForm` | `/widgets/ContactForm` | `onSubmit` | Contact form widget |
| `ContrastPreview` | `/widgets/ContrastPreview` | `foreground`, `background` | Accessibility contrast check |
| `FilterBar` | `/widgets/FilterBar` | `filters`, `onFilter` | Horizontal filter bar |
| `FilterChip` | `/widgets/FilterChip` | `label`, `active`, `onToggle` | Individual filter chip |
| `InvoiceTable` | `/widgets/InvoiceTable` | `invoices` | Invoice-specific table |
| `NavigationBar` | `/widgets/NavigationBar` | `items` | Secondary navigation |
| `SearchBar` | `/widgets/SearchBar` | `onSearch`, `placeholder` | Expandable search bar |
| `StatCard` | `/widgets/StatCard` | `title`, `value`, `trend`, `icon` | Simple stat card |
| `StatsGrid` | `/widgets/StatsGrid` | `stats` | Grid of stat cards |
| `StatusKPICard` | `/widgets/StatusKPICard` | `title`, `value`, `status` | KPI card with traffic-light status |

### 2.6 Providers (`/providers`)

| Export | Import from | Usage |
|---|---|---|
| `ThemeProvider` | `/providers` | Wrap app root for light/dark toggle |
| `useTheme` | `/providers` | `{ theme, toggleTheme }` |
| `LoadingProvider` | `/providers` | Global loading state management |
| `useLoading` | `/providers` | `{ isLoading, setLoading }` |
| `TransitionProvider` | `/providers` | Page transition animations |
| `HelpProvider` | `/providers` | Contextual help system |

### 2.7 Hooks (`/hooks`)

| Hook | Import from | Returns |
|---|---|---|
| `useLoadingState` | `/hooks` | `{ loading, error, execute }` |
| `useGlobalLoading` | `/hooks` | Global loading hook |
| `useAsyncOperation` | `/hooks` | Async operation with loading state |
| `usePageTransition` | `/hooks` | Page transition hook |
| `usePageEnter` | `/hooks` | Page enter animation |
| `useScrollToTop` | `/hooks` | Scroll to top on navigation |

### 2.8 Utilities (`/lib`)

| Export | Import from | Usage |
|---|---|---|
| `cn()` | `@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system` (root) | Tailwind class merger: `cn("px-4", condition && "bg-primary")` |
| `fadeVariants` | `/lib` | Motion fade animation |
| `fadeScaleVariants` | `/lib` | Motion fade + scale (modals) |
| `slideFromRightVariants` | `/lib` | Drawer slide animation |
| `slideFromBottomVariants` | `/lib` | Sheet slide animation |
| `transitionConfig` | `/lib` | `{ fast, normal, slow, spring }` |
| `shouldReduceMotion()` | `/lib` | Checks prefers-reduced-motion |

---

## 3. DESIGN TOKENS & STYLING RULES

### 3.1 Brand Identity

| Token | Value | Usage |
|---|---|---|
| **Primary** | `#00c951` (Green) | CTAs, links, focus ring, brand accent |
| **Secondary** | `#1C2D3A` (Navy) | Headers, secondary actions, dark backgrounds |
| **Font** | Satoshi (geometric sans-serif) | Exclusive font, loaded via theme.css |
| **Border Radius** | 10px base (`--radius`) | Cards: 14px, Buttons: 10px, Inputs: 8px |

### 3.2 Semantic Color Classes (Tailwind)

ALWAYS use semantic token classes. NEVER use raw Tailwind colors (bg-white, text-gray-500, etc.).

| Purpose | Background | Text | Border |
|---|---|---|---|
| **Page background** | `bg-background` | `text-foreground` | — |
| **Cards** | `bg-card` | `text-card-foreground` | `border-border` |
| **Muted areas** | `bg-muted` | `text-muted-foreground` | — |
| **Primary actions** | `bg-primary` | `text-primary-foreground` | — |
| **Secondary actions** | `bg-secondary` | `text-secondary-foreground` | — |
| **Destructive** | `bg-destructive` | `text-destructive-foreground` | — |
| **Success** | `bg-success` | `text-success-foreground` | — |
| **Warning** | `bg-warning` | `text-warning-foreground` | — |
| **Info** | `bg-info` | `text-info-foreground` | — |
| **Inputs** | `bg-input-background` | `text-foreground` | `border-input` |
| **Subtle background** | `bg-muted/30` | — | — |

### 3.3 Typography Scale

Font: Satoshi (automatically loaded). Letter-spacing: 0.025em global.

| Level | Size | Weight | Tailwind |
|---|---|---|---|
| **H1** | 30px | 600 | `text-3xl font-semibold` |
| **H2** | 24px | 600 | `text-2xl font-semibold` |
| **H3** | 20px | 500 | `text-xl font-medium` |
| **H4** | 18px | 500 | `text-lg font-medium` |
| **Body** | 16px | 400 | `text-base font-normal` |
| **Small** | 14px | 400 | `text-sm font-normal` |
| **Caption** | 12px | 400 | `text-xs font-normal` |
| **Label** | 14px | 500 | `text-sm font-medium` |
| **KPI Value** | 36px | 700 | `text-4xl font-bold leading-tight` |

### 3.4 Spacing System (base: 4px)

| Context | Tailwind | Value |
|---|---|---|
| Small elements gap | `gap-2` | 8px |
| Form inputs | `gap-4` | 16px |
| Card sections | `gap-3` or `gap-4` | 12-16px |
| Page sections | `gap-6` | 24px |
| Large sections | `gap-8` | 32px |
| Card padding | `p-6` | 24px |
| Page container padding | `p-8` | 32px |

### 3.5 Border Radius

| Component | Tailwind | Value |
|---|---|---|
| Buttons | `rounded-lg` | 10px |
| Cards, Modals | `rounded-xl` | 14px |
| Inputs, Badges | `rounded-md` | 8px |
| Pills, Tags | `rounded-full` | 9999px |

### 3.6 Elevation Shadows

| Level | Tailwind | Use |
|---|---|---|
| Level 1 | `shadow-elevation-1` | Buttons, inputs |
| Level 2 | `shadow-elevation-2` | Cards, tables |
| Level 3 | `shadow-elevation-3` | Hover cards, dropdowns |
| Level 4 | `shadow-elevation-4` | Modals, active KPI |

### 3.7 Dark Mode

The system supports light/dark mode via CSS class strategy:

```tsx
import { ThemeProvider, useTheme } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/providers";

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeProvider>
      <YourApp />
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
}

// Toggle anywhere
function Toggle() {
  const { theme, toggleTheme } = useTheme();
  return <Button onClick={toggleTheme}>{theme}</Button>;
}
```

All semantic colors automatically adapt. No conditional classes needed.

---

## 4. COMPOSITION PATTERNS

### 4.1 Basic Page Layout

```tsx
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";

function Page() {
  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-background p-8">
      <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto space-y-6">
        <div>
          <h1 className="text-3xl font-semibold text-foreground">Page Title</h1>
          <p className="text-muted-foreground">Page description</p>
        </div>
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle>Section Title</CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>Section description</CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent>
            {/* Content */}
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

### 4.2 Dashboard with KPI Cards

```tsx
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardContent } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";
import { StatCard } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/widgets";
import { Badge } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";

function Dashboard() {
  return (
    <div className="p-8 bg-muted/30 min-h-screen space-y-6">
      <h1 className="text-3xl font-semibold">Dashboard</h1>

      {/* KPI Row */}
      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6">
        <StatCard title="Revenue" value="$1.2M" trend="+12%" icon={DollarSign} />
        <StatCard title="Users" value="8,430" trend="+5.2%" icon={Users} />
        <StatCard title="Orders" value="1,240" trend="-2.1%" icon={ShoppingCart} />
        <StatCard title="Growth" value="23%" trend="+8%" icon={TrendingUp} />
      </div>

      {/* Content Grid */}
      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-[2fr_1fr] gap-6">
        <Card>
          <CardHeader><CardTitle>Main Chart</CardTitle></CardHeader>
          <CardContent>{/* Chart here */}</CardContent>
        </Card>
        <Card>
          <CardHeader><CardTitle>Recent Activity</CardTitle></CardHeader>
          <CardContent>{/* Activity list */}</CardContent>
        </Card>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

### 4.3 Form Layout

```tsx
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardContent, CardFooter } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";
import { Input, Label, Button, Select, SelectTrigger, SelectValue, SelectContent, SelectItem } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";

function FormExample() {
  return (
    <Card className="max-w-2xl mx-auto">
      <CardHeader>
        <CardTitle>Create Account</CardTitle>
      </CardHeader>
      <CardContent>
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
          <div className="space-y-2">
            <Label htmlFor="name">Full Name</Label>
            <Input id="name" placeholder="John Doe" />
          </div>
          <div className="space-y-2">
            <Label htmlFor="email">Email</Label>
            <Input id="email" type="email" placeholder="john@example.com" />
          </div>
        </div>
      </CardContent>
      <CardFooter className="flex justify-end gap-2">
        <Button variant="outline">Cancel</Button>
        <Button>Submit</Button>
      </CardFooter>
    </Card>
  );
}
```

### 4.4 Data Table Page

```tsx
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardContent } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";
import { Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";
import { Badge, Button, Input } from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system/ui";

function DataPage() {
  return (
    <div className="p-8 space-y-6">
      <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
        <h1 className="text-3xl font-semibold">Records</h1>
        <Button>Add New</Button>
      </div>
      <Card>
        <CardHeader>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
            <Input placeholder="Search..." className="max-w-sm" />
          </div>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardContent>
          <Table>
            <TableHeader>
              <TableRow>
                <TableHead>Name</TableHead>
                <TableHead>Status</TableHead>
                <TableHead>Amount</TableHead>
              </TableRow>
            </TableHeader>
            <TableBody>
              <TableRow>
                <TableCell>Item A</TableCell>
                <TableCell><Badge variant="success">Active</Badge></TableCell>
                <TableCell>$1,200</TableCell>
              </TableRow>
            </TableBody>
          </Table>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>
    </div>
  );
}
```

---

## 5. CRITICAL RULES

### DO:
- Always import theme.css before using components
- Use semantic color classes: `bg-background`, `text-foreground`, `border-border`
- Use the component library for all UI elements (Button, Card, Badge, Input, etc.)
- Use `gap-*` for spacing between elements, `p-*` for padding
- Use `rounded-xl` for cards, `rounded-lg` for buttons, `rounded-md` for inputs
- Use `shadow-elevation-*` for depth
- Wrap app in `<ThemeProvider>` for dark mode support
- Use `cn()` utility for conditional classes: `cn("base-class", condition && "conditional-class")`
- Use lucide-react for icons (it's a peer dependency)

### DON'T:
- Don't use raw Tailwind colors (`bg-white`, `text-gray-500`, `bg-green-500`)
- Don't use `bg-slate-*`, `bg-zinc-*`, or any Tailwind color palette directly
- Don't hardcode hex colors in className
- Don't create custom CSS for things the token system already provides
- Don't use `border-gray-200` — use `border-border` instead
- Don't use `text-black` or `text-white` — use `text-foreground` or `text-primary-foreground`
- Don't skip the theme.css import (components will look unstyled)
- Don't create custom Button/Card/Input components — use the library's

### Chart Colors:
When using Recharts, use CSS variables for chart colors:
```tsx
// Use these for chart series
"var(--chart-1)"  // Series 1
"var(--chart-2)"  // Series 2
"var(--chart-3)"  // Series 3
"var(--chart-4)"  // Series 4
"var(--chart-5)"  // Series 5
```

---

## 6. QUICK REFERENCE

### Most Used Components (80% of screens)

```tsx
import {
  Button,
  Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter,
  Badge,
  Input,
  Label,
  Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell,
  Tabs, TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent,
  Dialog, DialogTrigger, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogFooter,
  Select, SelectTrigger, SelectValue, SelectContent, SelectItem,
  Separator,
  Avatar, AvatarImage, AvatarFallback,
  Tooltip, TooltipTrigger, TooltipContent, TooltipProvider,
  Progress,
  Switch,
  Checkbox,
  ScrollArea,
  DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuTrigger, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem,
  Sheet, SheetTrigger, SheetContent, SheetHeader, SheetTitle,
} from "@biomahd-creator/financio-design-system";
```

### Color Palette Quick Reference

```
Primary Green:  bg-primary text-primary-foreground       (#00c951)
Navy:           bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground    (#1C2D3A)
Background:     bg-background text-foreground
Cards:          bg-card text-card-foreground
Muted:          bg-muted text-muted-foreground
Subtle BG:      bg-muted/30
Error:          bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground
Success:        bg-success text-success-foreground
Warning:        bg-warning text-warning-foreground
Info:           bg-info text-info-foreground
Border:         border-border
Input border:   border-input
Focus ring:     ring-ring  (green)
```
